events.title: Winter Clothes Donation Drive
events.description: Join us in distributing warm clothes and blankets to underprivileged families as winter approaches. Volunteers and donors are welcome!

events.title: Health Awareness Camp
events.description: A free health check-up and awareness session for rural children and women. Includes eye checkups, blood pressure testing, and nutrition counseling.

events.title: Education for All Workshop
events.description: Interactive workshop for parents and teachers to promote equal access to education. Focuses on encouraging girl child education and digital learning.

events.title: Clean Village Campaign
